todos.resolution: Implemented full table extraction using DocXMLater APIs (getRows, getCells, getText, getFormatting). Enhanced TableCell type to include text, colspan, rowspan, and paragraphs properties.

todos.text: DocXMLater needs to expose parseXml() method or we implement it here
todos.resolution: Framework now provides XMLParser.parseToObject() method. Updated parseXmlString() to use native framework implementation with full OOXML namespace support, attribute handling (@_ prefix), and text node parsing (#text).

todos.text: DocXMLater needs to expose buildXml() method
todos.note: Framework feature request - XMLBuilder.objectToXml() not yet implemented. Current framework uses imperative element() API. Updated buildXmlString() with clear documentation and warning log for future implementation.

apiUsed: options: ignoreAttributes, attributeNamePrefix, textNodeName, ignoreNamespace, parseAttributeValue, trimValues
todo2.frameworkVersion: Updated to version with parseToObject support
